department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
description: Supply and delivery of bulk coarse road salt to Parks Canada Agency on an ",as and when required basis".
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

* **Date of Tender Announcement**: 2023-06-05
* **Bid Solicitation Number**: WS4002251194
* **Title (English)**: Bulk Road Salt
* **Title (French)**: Sel de voirie en vrac
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-07-17
* **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A
* **Regions of Delivery**: Banff, Revelstoke
* **Short Description**: Parks Canada Agency requires a supplier to deliver bulk coarse road salt on an "as and when required basis" for regular winter maintenance on the Trans Canada and other highways in various National Parks of Canada.

* **Solicitation Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and others.
* **Regions of Opportunity**: N/A
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact Information**: Wiebe, Lyland (SPAC/PSPC), lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Submission Deadline**: 2023-06-27T14:00:00

Note: The **tender is already cancelled**. Its details have been provided for informational purposes only.
